title: Are Joe Theismann's Investments Better Than Yours?
itunes:title: Are Joe Theismann's Investments Better Than Yours?
description:
Motivational speaker, restaurateur, philanthropist, investor, and oh yeah… Super Bowl winning quarterback! Jason Kelly, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch sit down with former Washington Redskin Joe Theismann to find out how his life’s changed since we last spoke at Super Bowl LIV in Miami. Joe talks about how he picks his investments, the current state of the NFL season and his thoughts on the future of the “Washington Football Team”

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
